backend/main.mo: Actor defining admin auth, storage mixins, and many data types for books, notes, blogs, forum, profiles, and notifications.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of numerous frontend source files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH‑based light/dark theme variable definitions.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining all routes, layout, and theme/provider wrappers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProfi: Admin panel listing and searching user profiles with loading, error, and selection states.
frontend/src/components/AdminNotificatio: Empty placeholder component file for admin notifications.
frontend/src/components/AdminSignInPanel: Admin sign‑in UI handling Internet Identity login, admin credential submission, and error states.
frontend/src/components/BookComments.tsx: Displays book comments, allows adding new comments, liking comments, and formatting timestamps.
frontend/src/components/BookRating.tsx: Shows average book rating, user ratings, and lets authenticated users submit a rating.
Admin panel for uploading, editing, and deleting books, including file uploads, drag‑and‑drop, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple site footer with branding and Instagram link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with logo, routing links, authentication controls, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/LoginRequiredMod: Modal prompting users to log in or complete their profile before accessing restricted features.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Automatically prompts authenticated users to complete missing profile details and redirects them to the profile page.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Renders a user avatar using profile image or name initial with size options.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeMessageMo: Modal component showing a welcome message with icons and a button to close/start reading.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin data, and other backend resources.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page showing author info, photo, site assets, and Instagram link.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard for uploading books, covers, and site assets with drag‑and‑drop, previews, and admin authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Displays a grid of blog posts with preview media and file‑type icons, loading states, and navigation to post pages.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Placeholder blog post page showing a 'not available' message using the postId param.
frontend/src/pages/BookReaderPage.tsx: Loads book metadata and file assets, enforces authentication/profile checks, and displays the book via PDF or document viewer with comments and ratings.
frontend/src/pages/CharacterNoteViewerPa: Fetches and displays a character note file (pdf/image/video) with authentication/profile gating and viewer selection.
frontend/src/pages/ForumPage.tsx: Forum interface for listing threads and creating/replying to posts with authentication and profile‑completion enforcement.
frontend/src/pages/ForumPostPage.tsx: Placeholder forum post page showing an unavailable‑post message using the postId param.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing featured books, character notes, and blogs with auth-gated navigation and dynamic logo assets.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile editor handling validation, avatar upload, and saving profile data.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Admin settings panel for managing books, assets, blogs, character notes, and new coming items with upload and edit tools.
frontend/src/pages/SuggestionsPage.tsx: Page for authenticated users to submit suggestions and view recent entries with login-gated posting.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Utility for normalizing errors, classifying admin login issues, and validating file uploads.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into human-readable relative time strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing sensitive params from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s metadata, feature state, and pending feature requests for the admin user profile listing project.
